title: It works quite well for iPad!
text: Please don't be fooled thinking that this software works only for the iPhone when it works well with the iPod touch and the iPad! Why? I am the only one who noticed the problem when the software supposedly works for the iPhone when it really doesn't work all that well. The one who created the app needs to keep an open mind that this IQ plug app can work quite well with the IPad!

title: Please update app.
text:
Maybe I’m the only one still using the device and app, but still….
Update it. Thanks.

title: IPhoneX
text:
